categoryRubrics.description: Each entry has to be linked to related narrative text

categoryRubrics.rule: All Template Ids should be Valid with correct extension value
EffectiveDate/Time elements have the right time and timezone offsets
categoryRubrics.description: EffectiveTime elements in the section are expected to have timeoffsets along with the date and are typically nonzero timeoffsets. In addition they are expected to have the timezone information for proper interpretation.For e.g if the time is being defaulted to 000000 for hours, minutes and seconds for multiple entries it might be worth checking if the data was entered properly. Also if the time offsets are present without a timezone, the time may be interpreted incorrectly, hence timezones should be specified as part of the time element.

categoryRubrics.rule: EffectiveDate/Times for all historical activities should be within the lifespan on the patient
categoryRubrics.description: EffectiveDate/Times for historical events should be greater than the patient's date of birth and less than the earliest of current time or patient's date of death.

categoryRubrics.rule: The Display Names used by the structured data should match the Display Name (Preferred Name) within the Terminology

categoryRubrics.description: Each entry has to be linked to related narrative text

categoryRubrics.rule: All Template Ids should be Valid with correct extension value
EffectiveDate/Time elements have the right time and timezone offsets
categoryRubrics.description: EffectiveTime elements in the section are expected to have timeoffsets along with the date and are typically nonzero timeoffsets. In addition they are expected to have the timezone information for proper interpretation.For e.g if the time is being defaulted to 000000 for hours, minutes and seconds for multiple entries it might be worth checking if the data was entered properly. Also if the time offsets are present without a timezone, the time may be interpreted incorrectly, hence timezones should be specified as part of the time element.

categoryRubrics.rule: EffectiveDate/Times for all historical activities should be within the lifespan on the patient

referenceErrors.description: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:5252, CONF:10036 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.1.1"

A compatible R1.1 templateId without an extension must be included in addition to the existing R2.1 templateId with an extension for Encounter Activity (V3) 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.49:2015-08-01. When asserting this templateId, all C-CDA R2.1 document, section, and entry templates that had a previous version in C-CDA R1.1 SHALL include both the C-CDA R2.1 templateId and the C-CDA R1.1 templateId root without an extension. See C-CDA R2.1 Volume 1 - Design Considerations for additional detail (CONF:1198-32936, CONF:1198-32934, DSTU:757, DSTU:781).

A compatible R1.1 templateId without an extension must be included in addition to the existing R2.1 templateId with an extension for Encounter Diagnosis (V3) 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.80:2015-08-01. When asserting this templateId, all C-CDA R2.1 document, section, and entry templates that had a previous version in C-CDA R1.1 SHALL include both the C-CDA R2.1 templateId and the C-CDA R1.1 templateId root without an extension. See C-CDA R2.1 Volume 1 - Design Considerations for additional detail (CONF:1198-32936, CONF:1198-32934, DSTU:757, DSTU:781).

A compatible R1.1 templateId without an extension must be included in addition to the existing R2.1 templateId with an extension for Mental Status Observation (V3) 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.74:2015-08-01. When asserting this templateId, all C-CDA R2.1 document, section, and entry templates that had a previous version in C-CDA R1.1 SHALL include both the C-CDA R2.1 templateId and the C-CDA R1.1 templateId root without an extension. See C-CDA R2.1 Volume 1 - Design Considerations for additional detail (CONF:1198-32936, CONF:1198-32934, DSTU:757, DSTU:781).

The node '@unit' does not exist at the expected path /ClinicalDocument[1]/component[1]/structuredBody[1]/component[10]/section[1]/entry[1]/organizer[1]/component[3]/observation[1]/value[1] but is required as per the specification: If Observation/value is a physical quantity (xsi:type="PQ"), the unit of measure SHALL be selected from ValueSet UnitsOfMeasureCaseSensitive 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.12839 DYNAMIC (CONF:1198-31484).
